comment.body:
Yep. ZeroNet embedding works - you just have to make sure you <video src="../[ZITE ADDRESS]/data/users/[USER ADDRESS]/FILENAME.mp4" style="width: XXpx" controls></video>

In other words, don't use http://127.0.0.1:43110 .. because it won't work on proxies.. or people who run zeronet on a different port.
